Description: AllGoodsNetwork - Estate Sale items All items are accurately described ... it's all good at Allgoods. ===================================================================== Welcome to AllgoodsNetwork, from a Guitar collection that is being sold here on eBay, this is a 1980 Gibson ES-355 in Vintage Burst. Beautiful finish ... Smooth Jazz Riffs just seem to pour out of this Guitar ... plays and sounds just like butter! This one has the: (1) Master Volume, and (2) Tone Controls. Includes the original Gibson Hard Shell Case as seen ... super nice tone. This Guitar had been an ES Artist, now with the: MOOG Active Electronics removed, Duncan '59s added, and a PIO Cap added to enhance the tone. Clean and simple , a clean ES-355 now ... the (3) active electronics switch holes were capped with black plastic caps. New Thomastik-Infeld (10s) Swing Jazz (JS110) strings installed, no real fret wear, however lower frets and up to 12th fret seem more worn than the 12th and up frets. The Guitar weighs 9.1 lbs., and is located in Bullhead City, AZ . Please advise via email if you would like USPS Priority Mail with signature required. This seems to be much faster than FedEx for example. We have a few: Guitars, Amps and Parts etc. that we are selling as they became available from an Estate Sale, stay tuned and check back with this eBay site etc. Feel free to contact us for any questions at all, or an in-hand description. --- Shipping Information --- Shipping is very important to us, and as such we spend extra time and use additional packing material so that you receive your item in undamaged condition and fully insured. Shipping is to CONUS only, excluding: APO, Africa, Asia, Central America and Caribbean, Europe, Middle East, Oceania, Southeast Asia, South America, and PO Boxes . -----------------------------
